body.name: Gimars Upgrade 47” Computer Home Office Desk with Monitor Stand, Rustic Writing Desk with Adjustable Shelves & Large Bookshelf, Easy Assembly Gaming Desk, Spacious, Modren Design for Home Office

features: 【STURDY AND LOAD-BEARING WITH HIGH QUALITY MATERIAL】 - Gimars office desk is made of 0.8mm thick metal legs and 1.5cm thick wood desktop, this computer desk ensures stability and a high bearing capacity, it can withstand a weight of over 220 pounds. Extra fixed bookshelf and adjustable leg pads provide greater stability, ensure the desktop is level, non-slip & anti-scratch protectors under the legs to protect your floor from scratching.

【VERSATILE DESIGN WITH MONITOR STAND ,3 ADJUSTABLE SHELVES AND STROAGE】 - This office desk comes with monitor shelf, can accommodate two 24-25 inch monitors.The monitor stand can increase your desktop space and give you a correct office posture. The shelf of computer desk is adjustable,you can orient the shelf to the left or right side. And the height of shelf is adjustable, allow you to customize exclusive storage space.

【47 INCH DESK WITH DESKTOP & LARGE STROAGE SPACE】 - The size of gaming desk is 47.7 x 28.75 x 19.75 inch, have perfect size for plenty of keyboard, mouse ,paper work. And the side shelf of computer desk can be installd different height,and extra bookshelf increases stroage space, both allow you to have enough storage space for books, CDs, printer and gaming accessories. Perfect for work from home, gaming, officing, studying and writing.

【MODREN & SIMPLE DESIGN WITH RUSTIC SCRATCH RESISTANCE SURFACE】 - The home office desk has a glossy finish on its medium-density fiberboard top, giving it a stylish appearance and providing waterproofing and scratch resistance.With Modern simple style design, this Wood office desk will be a beautiful décor for your home.The industrial style appearance of the table can easily match with your furniture, perfect for your bedroom, living room, study room and office.

【EASY TO SET UP & WORRY-FREE SERVICE】- Our computer desk comes with an installation manual with component and accessory labeling for pre-installation identification.Easy-to-follow instructions and all assembly tools provided.We care about your purchasing experience. If you have any questions, please contact us!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Gimars 47'' RUSTIC COMPUTER DESK FOR OFFICE AND HOME

STURDY AND STABLE STRUCTURE WITH HIGH QUALITY MATERIAL Scratch Resistant Surface This office desk adopt 1.5cm sturdy particle board,the surface adopts spray molding technology, it's scratch resistant, waterproof, and easy to clean. Thickened Metal Desk Legs The desk legs are made of 0.8mm thick stainless steel metal material, which is very sturdy and stable, and can withstand a weight of over 220lb. Adjustable Height Desk Mat Adjustable feet help maintain balance of the study desk during each work session, while adjusting the subtle height to make your desk more comfortable Super Stable Screw The screws on the desk use an uncommon hexagonal socket screw, which ensures that the screws on the table are not easily unscrewed.
MONITOR STAND GIVE YOUR A COMFORTABLE & CORRECT POSTURE
ADJUSTABLE SIDE SHELF CUSTOMIZE YOUR EXCLUSIVE STORAGE SPACE
MULTIFUNCTION COMPUTER DESK FOR GAMING, OFFICING AND HOME

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Rustic Industrial look and sturdy for a good price
reviews.reviewText: I bought 2 of these desks, they were both easy to assemble and instructions where mostly clear on how to do either the left or right side installation. The only issue I had was when trying to put in the wood pieces, I didn't leave enough slack in my screws on the frame to get them into place easily. The instructions hadn't mentioned this at the time, but the owner has been informed of such and I hope to see the change in the future.Otherwise the wood, even though it is particle board like material, seems sturdy, enough for me to pull myself up off the floor when I had to adjust the bottom plate to sit more level. I can tell the box took quite the beating in shipment, but most of the desk seem unharmed, aside from one very small dent in the metal frame. The wood wasn't scratched at all despite there being a large gouge in one box. So I am pretty confident it can withstand a good bit of use without getting scuffed.Overall The look is beautiful, each piece of wood seems to have its own unique pattern even though it is just a printed laminate, and the design goes all the way around so you can decide which side to show off more.My only major disappointment with this desk is that there aren't more options for your shelving spaces. The largest space is only a fraction of an inch too small for my gaming computer tower, but I knew that before purchase. This is not a huge issue, as the tower is perfectly fine sitting on top of the desk, but doing so makes me sacrifice a bit of elbow room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good desk for the price
reviews.reviewText: I was skeptical with the price that this would be a very cheap desk upon arrival. However, after putting it together I found it’s actually pretty sturdy. The work space with the shelf on top is large enough for a pad of paper and keyboard so the size is decent as well. Definitely won’t be housing any majorly heavy items but I feel confident in my printer and computer calling it home.Regarding assembly: I put this together by myself and there were only a few moments that were slightly challenging but the assembly is relatively quick (maybe 25-30 minutes) and required very little effort aside from maneuvering with a few bulky pieces.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Not reversible as advertised. Planned to have the shelves on the right hand side, but piece "I" was not dilled properly so it could only have the shelves on the left or the shelf on the back had to be left off. I wasn't about to start drilling holes to make it work. I've purchased and assembled a lot of furniture. The hardware wasn't labeled and the illustrations were just okay. The desk looks nice and goes together relatively easy once you figure things out, but the wood-like surface is very thin and one piece was chipped. I had to glue it back on. Not going to deal with shipping it back, but would not recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install
reviews.reviewText: I loved this computer desk, it is sturdy and the manual included is easy to follow you just need to pay attention to the proper placement of screws so that you don't have to dissassemble everything again..would recommend it is stylish and priced well.. thanks

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 25, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very sturdy! Nice and compact design!
reviews.reviewText: My son needed a desk because hisJob decided to have a bunch of employees work from home now & he needed this for his home office area...something compact & not huge because he doesn’t have tons of space! He was looking for a desk that had enough room on the top of the desk to hold multiple monitors & keyboards...etc... and also fit in a small corner of our bedroom. This desk accomplishes all that! It looks awesome in his room!!! Nicely compact but still enough room for his needs! This nice desk is well-made and sturdy, and the open design keeps his office corner from looking stuffy & cluttered! The instructions were easy to read & follow. The hardware was packaged and labeled and there was a bag of extras. It came with a tiny wrench and Phillips head screwdriver, but he used a battery-powered driver to tighten the screws on the shelves...because it was faster & easier! I highly suggest having a second person to help with assembly and to put it together in the room in which it will be used. It’s a bit hard for just 1 person! This desk is a great height & he is able to easily type on his keyboard and his desk chair fits nicely underneath. This desk is definitely one of our best purchases this year!!! We purchased the walnut color and it looks beautiful in his bedroom! He is extremely happy with this purchase!!! Awesome product! 5⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
